attributes.action: Ban x-factor single from becoming Xmas No 1 single
attributes.additional_details:
X-factor singles generally become the Xmas No 1 single due to the X-factor monopoly having a 12 week build up on prime time national TV.

This is totally unfair to all the non X-factor artists as being the Xmas No 1 single used to produce many and varied Xmas songs which have stood the test of time and are still heard every Xmas..

I can't remember any of the X-factor Xmas songs which goes to prove my point.

So let's preserve the Xmas No 1 as a national treasure for the really original songs and not the
X-factor drivel that is force fed to the UK public.
